definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
ferrous metals (i.e. iron, chromium, manganese and alloys containing them)

pinyin: yan3 se4 su4 ceng2 hei1 se4 su4 liu2

sentences.english: The exaggerated bosom ornament, big black feathers joss-stick shoulder white dew.
sentences.chinese: 胸前点缀夸张的黑色羽毛，大露雪白香肩。

sentences.english: It soon turned into black smog as the smoke of the city poured into the air.
sentences.chinese: 随着城市的烟排入天空，白雾很快变成了黑色烟雾。

sentences.english: The boys wore black tail coats in mourning for George III.
sentences.chinese: 男孩身穿黑色燕尾服为乔治三世服丧。

sentences.english: This black metal plate is called a collector.
sentences.chinese: 这块黑色金属板被称为集热器。

sentences.english: Juveniles fledge looking like females, but with a black beak.
sentences.chinese: 幼鸟形似雌鸟，但是喙成黑色。

sentences.english: The black plastic will help seal and the weight of the door holds it down.
sentences.chinese: 黑色塑料膜的作用是密封，而门的重量会把它压住。

sentences.english: A soft, deep taupe shade that has subtle hues of rose.
sentences.chinese: 柔和，深黑色带有微妙的玫瑰色调。

sentences.english: Even if the whole universe are black, I would also like to use my face around to kindle.
sentences.chinese: 就算全宇宙都是黑色的，我也要用我的笑容燃亮四周。

sentences.english: There was a time when the only color in my closet was black.
sentences.chinese: 曾经有一段时间，我的衣柜里是清一色的黑色。

sentences.english: It is composed of hair follicle melanocytes are vivid.
sentences.chinese: 这是由毛囊中黑色素细胞不生动构成的。

sentences.english: The underparts were white with heavy dark streaks down the front.
sentences.chinese: 腹部从前到后有深黑色的条纹。

sentences.english: It’s no doubt that Black Friday will be busier this year than it ever has been.
sentences.chinese: 毋容置疑，今年的黑色星期五将会更为繁忙。

sentences.english: The Toucan has a large yellow and black beak and blue striped wings.
sentences.chinese: 犀鸟款有一个黄色和黑色的嘴和蓝色条纹的翅膀。

sentences.english: Some rocks from volcanoes break down to form black sand.
sentences.chinese: 有些火山岩被撞碎后会形成黑色的沙。

sentences.english: I'm normally shades of tan, brown and black.
sentences.chinese: 通常我日晒后颜色变暗，成为棕色和黑色。

sentences.english: They are watching fishing lines that have disappeared down into black water.
sentences.chinese: 他们观察着消失在黑色的水中的钓鱼线。
